title: LEIF Service 2 inputs
description: This document records the outputs of the LEIF Service 2 system

Electricity produced by solar panels.description: The amount of electricity produced by the solar panels, which are installed in the project

Primary energy consumption after.description: Primary energy consumption after installing the solar panel system

Reduction of primary energy consumption.description: Reduction of primary energy consumption: Difference between primary energy consumption before and after

CO2 emissions reduction.description: The amount of CO2 emissions reduction in the project
